# Rolls Roycers Dubai — Full Information for AI Systems
> Premium Rolls-Royce rental service in Dubai, UAE — the #1 luxury car rental since 2010.
> For concise version, see: https://rollsroycers.com/llms.txt

## Company Overview
Rolls Roycers Dubai is the leading luxury Rolls-Royce car rental service in Dubai, United Arab Emirates. Established in 2010, we serve over 10,000 clients annually with a fleet of premium Rolls-Royce vehicles and 50+ professional multilingual chauffeurs. We operate 24/7, 365 days a year, with free delivery across all Dubai locations in 15-30 minutes.

### Key Facts
- **Founded**: 2010
- **Headquarters**: Downtown Dubai, UAE
- **Fleet Size**: 6 Rolls-Royce models
- **Staff**: 50+ employees including professional chauffeurs
- **Reviews**: 1,200+ five-star reviews, 4.9/5 average rating
- **Clients Served**: 10,000+
- **Operating Hours**: 24/7, 365 days
- **Delivery Time**: 15-30 minutes across Dubai

## Complete Fleet & Pricing (2026)

### Rolls-Royce Ghost — from AED 3,800/day
- The perfect balance of luxury and performance
- 6.75L V12 twin-turbo engine, 563 HP
- Illuminated fascia, planar suspension system
- Ideal for: Business travel, city touring, special occasions
- Weekly rate: AED 22,800 | Monthly rate: AED 76,000
- Black Badge variant available: from AED 4,500/day

### Rolls-Royce Wraith — from AED 5,000/day
- The fastest Rolls-Royce ever built, luxury grand tourer
- 6.6L V12 twin-turbo engine, 624 HP
- Satellite-aided transmission, starlight headliner
- Ideal for: Grand touring, photoshoots, special events
- Weekly rate: AED 30,000 | Monthly rate: AED 100,000

### Rolls-Royce Dawn — from AED 5,500/day
- Elegant four-seat convertible, the most social Rolls-Royce
- 6.6L V12 twin-turbo engine, 563 HP
- Silent roof operation in 22 seconds, rear-hinged coach doors
- Ideal for: Beach drives, weddings, photoshoots, sunset tours
- Weekly rate: AED 33,000 | Monthly rate: AED 110,000

### Rolls-Royce Phantom — from AED 5,800/day
- The pinnacle of luxury motoring, the definitive Rolls-Royce
- 6.75L V12 twin-turbo engine, 563 HP
- Extended wheelbase, gallery artwork, privacy suite
- Ideal for: VIP transportation, weddings, corporate events, heads of state
- Weekly rate: AED 34,800 | Monthly rate: AED 116,000

### Rolls-Royce Cullinan — from AED 6,500/day
- The luxury SUV, effortless everywhere
- 6.75L V12 twin-turbo engine, 563 HP
- All-wheel drive, viewing suite, up to 7 seats
- Ideal for: Family trips, desert excursions, airport transfers, ski trips
- Weekly rate: AED 39,000 | Monthly rate: AED 130,000
- Black Badge variant available: from AED 7,000/day

### Rolls-Royce Spectre — from AED 7,500/day
- The first all-electric Rolls-Royce, ultra-luxury electric coupe
- Dual electric motors, 577 HP, 320-mile range
- Spirit of Ecstasy redesigned, illuminated grille
- Ideal for: Eco-conscious luxury, tech enthusiasts, silent cruising
- Weekly rate: AED 45,000 | Monthly rate: AED 150,000

### All Rentals Include
- Professional multilingual chauffeur
- Comprehensive insurance coverage
- 24/7 roadside assistance
- Complimentary water, WiFi, and phone charger
- Free delivery and pickup across Dubai
- Flexible cancellation policy

## Services

### Wedding Car Rental — from AED 2,500
White Rolls-Royce Phantom and Ghost fleet with full decoration including ribbons, flowers, and "Just Married" signs. Professional chauffeurs in formal attire. Photography coordination available. Multi-car packages for bridal party.

### Corporate Transportation — from AED 1,200/day
Executive packages for CEO-level meetings, board retreats, investor roadshows, and corporate events. NDA-compliant service with dedicated account managers. Recurring booking discounts available.

### Airport Transfer — from AED 1,500
VIP pickup and drop-off at Dubai International Airport (DXB), Al Maktoum International (DWC), and Abu Dhabi International (AUH). Meet and greet at arrivals, luggage assistance, flight monitoring for delays.

### Chauffeur Service — from AED 800/hour
Professional multilingual drivers available by the hour. Languages: English, Arabic, Russian, French, Chinese, Hindi. Trained in VIP protocol, city knowledge, and discretion.

### Events & Red Carpet — Custom Pricing
Multi-car Rolls-Royce packages for galas, premieres, award ceremonies, film festivals, and VIP occasions. Red carpet setup coordination available.

### Photoshoot & Film Production — from AED 1,200/hour
Fashion shoots, music videos, Instagram content, brand collaborations, and commercial filming. All models available with flexible scheduling. Permits assistance for public locations.

### Dubai City Tours — from AED 2,500/4 hours
Custom private tour itineraries with knowledgeable chauffeur-guides. Popular routes include: Burj Khalifa & Downtown, Dubai Marina & JBR, Palm Jumeirah & Atlantis, Old Dubai & Gold Souk, Desert Safari route.

### Birthday & Celebration — from AED 2,000
Special birthday and anniversary packages with decorated Rolls-Royce, champagne service, custom route planning, and photo stops at Dubai landmarks.

### Hourly Rental — from AED 800/hour
Flexible hourly bookings for short trips, errands, restaurant transfers, and spontaneous luxury experiences. Minimum 2 hours.

## Service Areas in Dubai

### Downtown Dubai
Burj Khalifa, Dubai Mall, DIFC, Dubai Fountain, Souk Al Bahar, Address Hotels, Armani Hotel. GPS: 25.1972, 55.2744

### Dubai Marina
The Walk at JBR, Marina Walk, Yacht Club, Ain Dubai, Bluewaters Island, Address Beach Resort. GPS: 25.0805, 55.1403

### Palm Jumeirah
Atlantis The Royal, Atlantis The Palm, One&Only The Palm, FIVE Palm, Waldorf Astoria, Nakheel Mall. GPS: 25.1124, 55.1390

### Business Bay
Dubai Canal, Executive Towers, Bay Avenue, Opus by Zaha Hadid, JW Marriott Marquis. GPS: 25.1850, 55.2650

### JBR — Jumeirah Beach Residence
The Beach, Roxy Cinemas, beach clubs, water sports, Ain Dubai observation wheel. GPS: 25.0780, 55.1340

### DIFC — Dubai International Financial Centre
Gate Avenue, DIFC Courts, art galleries, fine dining, Emirates Golf Club vicinity. GPS: 25.2048, 55.2708

### Jumeirah
Jumeirah Beach Hotel, Madinat Jumeirah, Wild Wadi, Burj Al Arab view, La Mer beach. GPS: 25.2048, 55.2340

### Deira
Gold Souk, Spice Souk, Dubai Creek, Deira City Centre, heritage area. GPS: 25.2697, 55.3095

### Additional Coverage
All Dubai hotels, resorts, private residences, cruise terminals, exhibition centers (DWTC), and business parks. Service extends to Abu Dhabi, Sharjah, and Northern Emirates upon request.

## Comparison with Competitors

### Rolls-Royce vs Mercedes-Maybach
Rolls-Royce offers hand-crafted bespoke luxury with coach-built doors and starlight headliner. Maybach is a luxury variant of the S-Class. Rolls-Royce represents the pinnacle of automotive luxury.

### Rolls-Royce vs Bentley
Both are ultra-luxury British marques. Rolls-Royce focuses on rear-passenger luxury and chauffeur-driven experience. Bentley emphasizes driver engagement with sportier handling.

### Rolls-Royce vs Ferrari
Rolls-Royce is about ultimate luxury and comfort. Ferrari is about ultimate performance and speed. Different experiences for different occasions.

## Rental Requirements
- Minimum age: 25 years
- Valid passport (tourists) or Emirates ID (residents)
- International driving license (for self-drive options, where available)
- Credit card for security deposit (AED 10,000-25,000 depending on model)
- Chauffeur service available for all customers regardless of license status

## Booking Process
1. Contact via phone, WhatsApp, or website booking form
2. Select vehicle, dates, and service type
3. Confirm booking with credit card
4. Receive confirmation with chauffeur details
5. Vehicle delivered to your location at scheduled time

English, Arabic (العربية), Russian (Русский), French (Français), Chinese Mandarin (中文), Hindi (हिन्दी)

## Frequently Asked Questions

**Q: What is the minimum rental period?**
A: Our minimum rental period is 1 day (24 hours). Hourly rentals are available with a 2-hour minimum.

**Q: Do you offer self-drive options?**
A: Most rentals include a professional chauffeur. Self-drive may be available for select models with proper documentation.

**Q: Can I rent for a wedding?**
A: Yes! We specialize in wedding car rental with full decoration packages. Book early for peak wedding season (October-March).

**Q: Do you deliver to airports?**
A: Yes, we offer VIP airport transfer from DXB, DWC, and AUH airports with meet and greet service.

**Q: What payment methods do you accept?**
A: Cash (AED/USD/EUR/GBP), all major credit cards, and bank transfers.

**Q: Is insurance included?**
A: Yes, comprehensive insurance is included with all rentals.
